TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CatalogPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class CatalogPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控件的集合，这些控件用于提供最终用户可添加到网页的 Web 服务器控件目录。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to provide catalogs of Web server controls that end users can add to a Web page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是只读集合的控件，通常由区域用来跟踪的一套区域包含的控件。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by a zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 当 Web 部件页进入目录模式时，该区域创建一个新对象组成控件。When a Web Parts page enters catalog mode, the zone creates a new object consisting of the controls. 每个控件的集合中可以包含零个或多个 Web 服务器控件，可用的服务器控件目录中的窗体中显示了这些对引用。Each control in the collection can contain references to zero or more Web server controls, which are displayed in the form of a catalog of available server controls. 你可以创建的为你自己的编程使用，例如，你需要执行大量操作的一组时的控件集合控件。You can create a collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使对象是只读的你可以以编程方式更改到集合中引用的基础控件。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的几种用法类。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 有于此代码示例的四个部分：There are four parts to this code example: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 自定义的类控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`，该网页中引用，而包含在一个控件。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is contained in one of the controls. - 引用的网页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，则包含具有两个控件控件从该区域，在设置声明的 Web 部件控件和包含事件驱动的代码来创建和操作对象。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains a control with two of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains event-driven code to create and manipulate a object. - 在浏览器中加载时的代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 用户控件的源代码来自于另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 对于此代码示例正常工作，你需要获取该用户控件从.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 下面的代码示例的第二个部分是`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 请注意该控件具有名为的属性`ContentText`; 此属性保留用户在文本框中输入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，``页元素包含两个声明控件。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for two controls. 这些控件成为自定义的一部分时创建的对象`Button1_Click`方法执行。These controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. 控件包含已之前关闭由用户在运行时的 Web 服务器控件。The control contains Web server controls that have been previously closed by a user at run time. 中的控件控件可以添加回页面。Controls in the control can be added back to a page. 控件包含自定义声明`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The control contains a declaration of the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 目录模式页面时，用户可以为添加`TextDisplayWebPart`控制到页，以便它可在普通浏览模式中。When the page is in catalog mode, a user can add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page so that it can be used in normal browse mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 你可以添加自定义控件添加到页上通过选择它旁边的复选框并单击**添加**。You can add the custom control to the page by selecting the check box next to it and clicking **Add**. 单击**关闭**来返回到浏览模式的页。Click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 在控件上你刚添加，如果你单击谓词菜单 （标题栏中显示的向下箭头），然后单击**关闭**，从页面中删除该控件并将其添加到控件。On the control you just added, if you click the verbs menu (the down arrow that appears in the title bar) and then click **Close**, the control is removed from the page and added to the control. 使页返回到目录模式，并单击**页目录**链接可查看的内容控件。Return the page to catalog mode, and click the **Page Catalog** link to view the contents of the control. 请注意，现在关闭的控件显示存在。Notice that the control you closed now appears there. 单击**显示 CatalogPart 属性**按钮访问对象，并显示所包含的某些属性控件。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含区域控件通常是创建控件对象，通过方法。The zone that contains controls is typically the control that creates a object, through the method. 但是，你也可以创建你自己编程有其他用途的对象。However, you can also create your own object for other programmatic purposes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的空实例类。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 内部使用此构造函数重载类在其方法来创建一个空集合对象。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 然后，区域创建的所有实例控件在子区域模板中，声明并使用集合的内部方法来添加它们。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method of the collection to add them. 不能使用此重载构造函数来创建的新实例并添加控件添加到它。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of a and add controls to it. 你必须使用的其他重载之一构造函数相反。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection catalogParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的实例类，并传入的集合控件。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 这是一个重载可用于创建一个新的构造函数对象，并添加控件添加到它。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 尽管该构造函数创建的实例为只读，则仍可以访问个人以编程方式控制集合中并调用其属性和方法。Although the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用此构造函数的一个常见方案是如果你想要执行批处理操作时的整个集控件，如更改内容、 外观或一组相关的项的位置。One common scenario for using this constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义，并执行批处理操作，若要更改单个控制集合中，即使它是只读的也是如此。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a custom , and perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection even though it is read-only. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建对象，将添加两个网页中的对象，控制，然后创建一个新对象使用构造函数。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates an object, adds the two controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它还演示了如何可以对基础进行批处理更改控件，即使集合本身是只读的也是如此。It also demonstrates how you can make batch changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection itself is read-only. 该代码循环访问集合中，更新的每个控件的属性。The code loops through the collection, updating the property of each control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击**显示 CatalogPart 属性**按钮访问对象，并显示所包含的某些属性控件。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 此外，如果将鼠标指针的边框内的标题文本上控件，你可以看到已添加到控件中，单击 （说明会显示工具提示） 按钮时的新说明文本。Also, if you position your mouse pointer over the title text within the border of the control, you can see the new description text that was added to the control when you clicked the button (the description appears in a ToolTip). 如果你单击**页目录**链接以显示控件，你会发现它还具有已更新的说明。If you click the **Page Catalog** link to display the control, you will find that it also has an updated description.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart catalogPart) cil managed

param.name: catalogPart
param.span: 要对其进行检查以确定是否位于集合中的 。

span.span: A that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够确定是否特定对象属于对象。The method enables you to determine whether a particular object is part of a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何决定是否特定控件为属于对象。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether a particular control is a member of a object. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建一个新对象名为`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 该方法使用方法来确定是否`PageCatalogPart1`控制存在，并且如果是这样，检索的控件和更改的属性值。The method uses the method to determine whether the `PageCatalogPart1` control exists, and if so, retrieves the control and changes a property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 添加自定义控件添加到页上通过选择它旁边的复选框并单击**添加**。Add the custom control to the page by selecting the check box next to it and clicking **Add**. 单击**关闭**来返回到浏览模式的页。Click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 在控件上你刚添加，如果你单击谓词菜单 （标题栏中显示的向下箭头），然后单击**关闭**，从页面中删除该控件并将其添加到控件。On the control you just added, if you click the verbs menu (the down arrow that appears in the title bar) and then click **Close**, the control is removed from the page and added to the control. 使页返回到目录模式，并单击**页目录**链接可查看的内容控件。Return the page to catalog mode, and click the **Page Catalog** link to view the contents of the control. 请注意，已向其添加你关闭的控件。Notice that the control you closed has been added to it. 单击**显示 CatalogPart 属性**按钮访问对象，并显示所包含的某些属性控件。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 选择中包含的服务器控件旁边的复选框控件中，单击**添加**以将其添加回页面，然后单击**关闭**来返回到浏览模式的页。Select the check box next to the server control contained in the control, click **Add** to add it back to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 单击再次在控件中，谓词菜单，然后请注意，现在关闭谓词会已被删除。Click the verbs menu again on the control, and note that now the close verb is gone. 中的代码已移除`Button1_Click`方法时使用它方法来检查`PageCatalogPart1`，并将其属性`false`。It was removed by the code in the `Button1_Click` method, when it used the method to check for `PageCatalogPart1`, and then set its property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart[] array, int index);

summary.span: 将集合复制到 对象的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，当你想要组合可以包含一个自定义数组中控制对象或这些控件的子集。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, or a subset of those controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As CatalogPartCollection

summary.span: 引用集合的一个空的静态只读实例。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态、 只读的、 空实例可减少内存使用量情况下，要空集合的实例通过方法返回正确的对象类型或与另一个对象实例进行比较，但不是需要将成员添加到实例。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart catalogPart) cil managed

span.span: A that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
A that is a member of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，如果你有多个上 Web 部件页，并且你的控件需要查找集合中的特定控件。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定的一个成员的位置使用进行收集其属性。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine the position of a member of a collection by using its property. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建一个新对象名为`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 该方法使用要检索的位置属性控制，，然后调整控件上的属性值。The method uses the property to retrieve the position of the control, and then changes a property value on the control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中后，你可以通过将页切换到目录模式选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。After you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击**显示 CatalogPart 属性**按钮访问对象，并显示所包含的某些属性控件。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 单击**页目录**链接以显示的内容控件。Click the **Page Catalog** link to display the contents of the control. 请注意，它有只有一个标题和没有边框，因为其属性值已更改为中使用的代码属性来检索控件。Note that it has only a title and no border, because its property value was changed to in the code that used the property to retrieve the control.

summary.span: 根据位置或唯一标识符返回集合中的特定成员。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As CatalogPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定 的索引。

value.span: 位于集合中指定索引处的 。

span.span: A at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引器允许你访问基础中控制对象的索引，并更改其属性值或调用方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问的成员对象使用其索引。The following code example demonstrates how you can access a member of a object using its index. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建一个新对象名为`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 请注意，该方法使用索引器以从集合的第一个成员中检索信息。Note that the method uses the indexer to retrieve information from the first member of the collection. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击**显示 CatalogPart 属性**按钮访问对象，并显示所包含的某些属性控件。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 中的可用服务器控件的计数控件通过使用获取中的索引器`Button1_Click`方法。The count of available server controls within the control is obtained by using the indexer in the `Button1_Click` method.

value.span: 集合中 ID 等于 的值的第一个 。

span.span: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引器允许你访问基础中控制对象使用的字符串标识符。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by use of a string identifier. 尽管对象是只读的你可以更改属性值或索引器访问的基础控件上调用方法。Although the object is read-only, you can change the property values or call methods on the underlying controls accessed by the indexer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问的成员对象使用其字符串 ID 值。The following code example demonstrates how you can access a member of a object using its string ID value. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 中的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建一个新对象名为`myParts`。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 该方法使用索引器以检索其信息控件，这是集合的第二个成员。The method uses the indexer to retrieve information about the control, which is the second member of the collection. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击**显示 CatalogPart 属性**按钮访问对象，并显示所包含的某些属性控件。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 中的可用服务器控件的计数控件通过使用获取中的索引器`Button1_Click`方法。The count of available server controls within the control is obtained by using the indexer in the `Button1_Click` method.
